name: Think Different Events Ltd.
description:
Our aim is to provide a unique, high quality event management service with the creativity and flexibility to continually exceed the expectations of all our clients and their audience; in essence to Think Different!
Organising events can often appear dead easy.Â 
To a delegate they get their invitation, arrive at the venue, register, attend the sessions, have refreshments, network, fill in the evaluation form and depart. All without a hitch. The perception is that anyone could organise the event.
